en_question:
5.31 Tuanjie Township consists of 8 villages. The coordinates of each village and the number of primary school students are shown in Table 5-14. Table 5-14
Village IDCoordinatesNumber of Students

Considering economies of scale, it is planned to build one primary school in each of two villages. Question: In which two villages should the schools be built to minimize the total walking distance for all primary school students? (Walking distance is calculated using Euclidean distance between villages.)
